people.text1: Hoang Duy Thien Nguyen (Tim Nguyen) is a current undergraduate at the University of North Carolina in Charlotte. He is currently pursuing a Bachelor's in Computer Science with a concentration in Software Engineering and a minor in Physics.
people.text2: He created this website hoping to spread the joy of coding to younger generation. As the world advances more and more into a digital age, software developer become a high demand job and coding languages become more and more familiar with society. Escaping Cow was created to help people practice and learn simple, basic python skills in a fun and friendly way.
